original_title: 父と妹のヤバすぎる関係… 天音ゆい
overview: Yui is hella sexy and the step-daddy couldn’t resist the temptation anymore. And as if this affair wasn’t risky enough, the good guy decided to not use a condom. Because why would he?
title: The Relationship Between My Father And Sister Is Too Dangerous … Yui Amane
